CustomField.description: It enables to choose how to configure a Leaderboard in Missions. For Missions with Objective, Leaderboard Mode can be "Progress" or "Performance"; for Missions without Objective Leaderboard Mode must be "Performance".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose how Mission progress is displayed: "Progress" to show the progress percentage of Members participating in a Mission (Mission with Objective only) or "Performance" to show Members' performance score.
CustomField.label: Leaderboard Mode
